      • addContentFile

        public void addContentFile(java.lang.String merchantStoreCode,
                           com.salesmanager.core.model.content.InputContentFile contentFile)
                    throws com.salesmanager.core.business.exception.ServiceException
        Method responsible for adding content file for given merchant store in underlying Infinispan tree cache. It will take InputContentFile and will store file for given merchant store according to its type. it can save an image or any type of file (pdf, css, js ...)
        Specified by:
        addContentFile in interface ContentService
        Parameters:
        merchantStoreCode - Merchant store
        contentFile - InputContentFile being stored
        Throws:
        com.salesmanager.core.business.exception.ServiceException - service exception
